QueryResult.text: SELECT CO.ID, CO.COUNTRY_CODE, CO.ISO_NUMBER, CO.CURRENCY_ID, CO.IS_ACTIVE, CO.CREATED_DATE, CO.CREATED_BY, CO.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, CO.LAST_UPDATED_BY, CO.PAPER_TYPE, CU.CURRENCY_CODE, NLS.LANGUAGE_CODE, NLS.NAME, NLS.DESCRIPTION FROM CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS NLS, CMN_COUNTRIES CO, CMN_CURRENCIES CU WHERE NLS.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_COUNTRIES' AND NLS.PK_ID = CO.ID AND CO.CURRENCY_ID = CU.ID
